# compare the datasets in npn
```{r dataset_statistic}
path_npn <- "/nfs/turbo/seas-zhukai/phenology/NPN/individual_phenometrics/leaf_flower/with_climate/"
npn <- read_rds(str_c(path_npn, "Quercus", ".rds"))

npn %>%
  group_by(dataset_id) %>% 
  summarise(count = n())

npn %>%
  group_by(npn$partner_group) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count))
```
